name: Tangle of Battle
summary: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.
description:
Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe. Attempt to Grapple the triggering enemy.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
trigger: You critically hit an adjacent enemy.
